H0.text: A dog sitting on command is an example of inherited behavior.

H1.text: A parrot repeating a phrase is an example of inherited behavior.

H2.text: A bird flying south for the winter is an example of inherited behavior, where the migration pattern is genetically encoded rather than learned.

H3.text: A horse competing in a horse show is an example of inherited behavior.

A4.text: Bird migration is controlled primarily by day length, signalled by hormonal changes in the bird's body.

A5.text: Some species such as Pacific salmon migrate to reproduce; every year, they swim upstream to mate and then return to the ocean.
